#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
int gcd(int a,int b)
{if(a%b==0)
  return b;
   return gcd(b,a%b);
   }
  
 
int main()
{int T,x1,x2,y1,y2;
 cin>>T;
 while(T--)
 {cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
  int xval=abs(x1-x2);
  int yval=abs(y1-y2);
  if(xval==0||yval==0)
   cout<<"0"<<endl;
   else{
  int g=gcd(xval,yval);
  cout<<xval+yval-g<<endl;
  }
  }return 0;
  }
